descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Card Match VR is a relaxing yet challenging VR memory game built around classic pair matching. Flip cards, remember their positions, and clear all pairs as levels become more demanding—perfect for quick play sessions and focus training.

Controls & Setup

After starting the game, press A on the controller to align the play area to your height.

Use your hands to touch cards and flip them.

How to play

Press A to align the game to your height

Touch a card to flip it

Flip a second card to find a match

If they don’t match, remember positions and try again

Clear all pairs to complete the level

Highlights

Classic memory matching gameplay in VR

Quick, satisfying rounds with increasing difficulty

Comfortable and easy to understand for first-time VR users

A calm, casual puzzle experience you can replay anytime
